channel.title: Niki Ashton

item.title: Mentioned by Huffington Post Canada
item.description:
The Fraser Institute Knows Nothing About Child Care
By MP Niki Ashton (Churchill), Official Opposition Critic for the Status of Women Sept. 4th 2013. Seventy three per cent of mothers in Canada with children under the age of 16 are working mothers, and women still earn on average 30 cents less to the dollar ...
